content: I love to read what other writers are up to.Can’t go a day without reading my favorite genre, which is sci-fi. I’m halfway through a re-reading of C.J. Cherryh’s 18 book (so far)Foreigner series. I read while I eat, steal time during the day when other commitments are done, and always at least 20 minutes before sleep. Sometimes I go short on sleep, but rarely on reading.
